sentences.sContent: ...hurricane incidence has dropped off the charts...
Hurricane Betty is now approaching the coast of Florida.
sentences.sCn: 飓风贝蒂正在逼近佛罗里达海岸。

phrases.pCn: n. 防风灯；飓风灯；马灯

remMethod.val: hurri(看作hurry， 匆忙) ＋ cane → 来得很匆忙的风 → 飓风

trans.tranOther: a storm that has very strong fast winds and that moves over water
